parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Georgeta Dogaru - candidatǎ la Senat pentru Dâmbovița din partea partidului REPER". This clearly identifies a specific candidate for the Senate elections in Dâmbovița County, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a specific demographic (women aged 38-65 in Dâmbovița County). This indicates an attempt to reach a wide audience within that demographic, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The phrase "Votați REPER pe 1 decembrie în Dâmbovița!" is a direct call to action, urging voters to support the REPER party. This explicitly aims to influence the election outcome, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The objective is clearly electoral.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear promotional message for a political candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1260800031733382</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes Georgeta Dogaru, a senatorial candidate for the REPER party in Dâmbovița County.  The post directly encourages voters to support REPER, using explicit language ("Votați REPER").  The paid nature of the advertisement, targeting a specific demographic, and the clear call to action all point towards electoral propaganda. While it lacks a CMF number, the other criteria strongly suggest it's intended to influence the election.  The post's timing (after the official campaign period) is not explicitly stated in the provided data, but if it was posted after the legal deadline, it would constitute a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Georgeta Dogaru</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
REPER Dâmbovița, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidata Georgeta Dogaru la Senat din partea partidului REPER și îndeamnă la votarea partidului REPER în Dâmbovița, cu fraza "Votați REPER pe 1 decembrie în Dâmbovița!", având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea candidatei și partidului menționat, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, și ID-ul postării pe Facebook fiind 1260800031733382.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
